context: Dynatrace, Inc. is a software intelligence platform focused on application performance monitoring, observability, and AIOps. AI-powered observability leader. Competing with Datadog, Splunk.

competitors.name: Datadog
competitors.notes: Leading cloud monitoring and security platform with broad observability capabilities

competitors.name: Splunk (Cisco)
competitors.notes: Data platform for security and observability, acquired by Cisco in 2024

competitors.name: New Relic
competitors.notes: All-in-one observability platform for developers and operations teams

competitors.name: Elastic Observability
competitors.notes: Open platform for search, observability, and security solutions

competitors.name: AppDynamics (Cisco)
competitors.notes: Application performance monitoring and business observability

competitors.name: Honeycomb
competitors.notes: Observability platform focused on debugging production systems

competitors.name: Grafana Labs
competitors.notes: Open source observability stack with dashboards and monitoring

competitors.name: ServiceNow ITOM
competitors.notes: IT operations management with AIOps and observability capabilities
